description: These pants are crafted from lightweight stretch sateen and feature our signature Pony embroidered at the coin pocket.
fitting_details: Stretch Classic Fit: sits at the waist. Eased through the leg.
Size 46W has a 12¼" rise and a 19½" leg opening.
Belt loops. Zip fly with a signature buttoned closure.
Five-pocket styling with signature metal rivets.
Leather "Polo Ralph Lauren" patch at the back right waist.
Signature embroidered Pony at the coin pocket.
Due to the natural characteristics of this material, the coloring may rub off onto fabrics and upholstery.
